main event: An observer reported seeing a bright silver colored object that appeared to be hovering for several seconds in Seven Hills, Ohio on July 20, 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as a silver disc shaped object that traveled across the sky at a fast speed., The observer did not indicate it was an unconventional type aircraft., Cleveland Hopkins Airport received no reports of similar sightings at the time., The sighting included observations about the sunlight reflection from an aircraft., The sighting report was handled by Lt Colonel Hector Quintanilla, Jr. from the USAF.
witness description: The observer described the object as a steady bright light, the size of the moon that moved north and descended behind the trees.
